title: bitxor~
description: The `bitxor~` object performs a bitwise exclusive OR (XOR) operation on two audio signals, or between an audio signal and a 32-bit integer bitmask. It offers multiple modes for converting floating-point signal values to integers before comparison, and the bitmask can be set via an argument, float input, or a `bits` message. This object is useful for low-level signal manipulation based on bitwise logic.
